title: Mirror matches in normals
body: We currently have no way to avoid mirror matches in any non ranked queue except for ARAM. It really makes me sad when I see them in load screen and know there is nothing I can do about it.

replies.body: What's wrong with playing against the same champion. Adds to the fun XD, it is normals.

Tell you whats even more awkward.  Having the exact same bot lane. Exactly the same. 
Yes this is very annoying but unfourtanetly there is nothing that can be done unless you play ranked queues. Riot really needs to bring back Normals draft for our server.

You still get mirror matches in aram. there shouldn't be anything to stop mirror matches in normals anyway. if a two people, one on each team, want to play the same champ, why shouldn't they be allowed to.

>You still get mirror matches in aram.

Your funny aren't you?

Because I and all my friends who play normals are more than over it. We want variety and strategy in our games, not we both have the same disadvantages and advantages. I also have not seen a mirror match in ARAM since when it was released which I imagine was a bug with rerolling.
